content.question: Which of the following is the ground-state electron configuration for the <math alttext="N a, with a positive one charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Na</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math> ion?

choices.label: <math alttext="1 s 2, 2 s 2, 2 p 6, 3 s 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>1</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="1 s 2, 2 s 2, 2 p 6, 3 s 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
